name: nytimes
text: Violence remains at an “all-time high" at New York City's jail complex on Rikers Island, a federal monitor found, despite a landmark legal settlement 5 years ago in which city officials promised to stamp out the jail's culture of violence. https://t.co/Qd3TUatB5C

name: nytimes
text:
In their first week back at school, U.S. students have faced social distancing measures, positive coronavirus tests and emergency quarantines. Here’s what they say school is like in the age of Covid-19.
https://t.co/DmTFvAqFW3

name: nytimes
text:
The State Department on Thursday lifted its travel advisory warning U.S. citizens against all international travel during the pandemic. The department said it would revert to its practice of issuing advisories on a country-by-country basis.
https://t.co/zklfSF4XPe https://t.co/aeIEe0w6kt
